situation.title: Possibilities and obligations of foreigners when entering the Czech Republic
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for entering the territory of the Czech Republic.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

It is possible to travel to the Czech Republic only in strictly necessary cases, such as work- or business-related trips (including commuters), trips motivated by family necessities and medical reasons.

Due to crisis measures, it is currently not possible to travel for tourism or to visit friends.

Several rules and exceptions apply to foreigners entering the territory of the Czech Republic, which are clearly described on the website of the Ministry of the Interior of the Czech Republic.

In case of doubts or questions, please call the Ministry of the Interior of the Czech Republic: +420 974 820 680 - option 3 (Mon - Thu: 8:00 - 16:00 and Fri: 8:00 - 12:00). Or by e-mail: cestovani.covid19@mvcr.cz.
